trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around May 4th 2006
divs: Sighting Detailsi had just got done with the last delivery and was going to turn in the keys. i looked up and saw somthing like a white balloon, like a small white spot. so i went back in the truck and took out my binoculars and to my surprise it was not a balloon. and it was not been taken with the wind like the clouds,it was very still and had some glowing. i looked for about 3-5 minutes and when i came back out(15mins)later it was gone.
